alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 7:12AM CDT until May 27 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Goodland KS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Nebraska... Frenchman Creek Near Culbertson affecting Hitchcock County. For the Frenchman Creek...including Culbertson...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Frenchman Creek Near Culbertson. * WHEN...From this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Lowland areas near the vicinity of the gage will become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM CDT Friday the stage was 4.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning to a crest of 9.6 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 715 PM CDT.
